snippet: ROSENFELD--Henry. Henry passed away peacefully in his home on December 26, 2015. He is survived by his children Jessica, Diego (Heidi), Julia, grandchildren and brother Albert. Henry was an elegant man with a strong moral compass, a passion for world affairs and Israel. He was born in Chile and travelled throughout South America with his family for business in film, settling in Argentina. After graduating Columbia University and falling in love with America he raised a family with his late wife Leonor in Scarsdale, NY. Henry was prosperous in business which afforded him time to spend with family, contribute to Jewish causes, and play golf with friends. His generosity and cheerful sense of humor will be missed. Rest in peace father, friend, husband, and visionary. 1/3
